nodes.bodyText: Does these paths need megamek added too?

No. Those that were added to the compileMM task were to find the class and resource files to place into the jar in the build directory of the megamek subdirectory rather than the top level. But once built, the jar is placed in the libs subdirectory of the current build directory, which is where it looks to find it in this task.
All the mml source is in the top-level directory, unlike MM and MekHQ, which put everything in a subdirectory.
Same here. The MML build directory is in the top level.
